root.Summary: 1: Yang Y, Sun H, Li X, Ding Q, Wei P, Zhou J. Transforming Growth FactorBeta-Induced Is Essential for Endotoxin Tolerance Induced by a Low Dose ofLipopolysaccharide in Human Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells.
